titleStmt.title: A short discourse of the true knowledge of Christ Jesus to which are added some passages in the reasonableness of Christianity &c. and its vindication : with some animadversions on Mr. Edward's reflections on the reasonableness of Christianity and on his book entituled Socinianism unmask'd / by S. Bold.
titleStmt.author: Bold, S. (Samuel), 1649-1737.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. and J. Churchil,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
